text: @JimInhofe @realDonaldTrump @POTUS Stories that don’t fit your narrative: over 140,000 of my friends died from Covid-19 since it was not a hoax. Many were small business owners. Other small business owners were forced to shutter because the Republicans did nothing to help them. But hey, let’s blame the media.
